dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4036428T] IPS Piracy Report #3715
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4036428T] IPS Piracy Report #3715

Sender Information: 
Invision Power Services, Inc 
piracy@invisionpower.com 
1.800.901.5491 
1115 Vista Park Drive 
Suite C 
Forest, VA 24551 
Recipient Information: 
Webhost of fighters.com.br 
 
Dear Webhost of fighters.com.br, 
 
Re: Unauthorized Use of Invision Power Services, Inc.'s Copyrighted
Software on Site Hosted by Webhost of fighters.com.br.  
 
As an employee of Invision Power Services, Inc. (IPS), one of the
world's leading providers of software and support services to online
communities, I am authorized to act on IPS's behalf to investigate and
take action with respect to the unauthorized use, distribution, and
infringement of IPS's copyrighted software. 
 
We have been trying to contact the owner of the web site
fighters.com.br/forum on several occasions, without a response to verify
that they have a valid license to use the IP.Board software.  At this
point we have to assume that either the contact information we have is
incorrect or a unauthorized use of IPS's copyrighted software, Invision
Power Board ("the Work"), is occurring at the web site
fighters.com.br/forum, which is hosted by your company.  IPS has
reserved all rights in the Work. 
   
The web site referenced above, found at fighters.com.br/forum, clearly
uses the Work as its basis. 
 
Please have the owner of the web site referenced above, found at
fighters.com.br/forum, verify that he/she owns a licensed version of
IPS's copyrighted software, Invision Power Board using the following
link. 
 
http://www.invisionpower.com/piracyreport.php?component=piracy&do=valida
te&id=3715&key=1165168624 
 
Thank you for your prompt attention and cooperation regarding this
matter.  If you have any questions or concerns regarding this request,
please email piracy@invisionpower.com. 
 
Thank you, 
Sincerely, 
 
 
Piracy Dept. 
Invision Power Services, Inc - Piracy Division
dmca.principal_name: Invision Power Services, Inc.- Piracy Division
